pages.text: Zicheng jidujiao de ren, wo ceng yu tamen diyue, dan tamen paoqi ziji suo shou de yibufen quan jie, guwo shi tamen huxiang chouhen, zhiyu fuhuo ri. Na shi, an la yao ba tamen de xingwei gaosu tamen

Xinfeng tian jing de ren a! Wo de shizhe que yi lailin nimen, ta yao wei nimen chanming nimen suo yinhui de xuduo jing wen, bing fangqi xuduo jing wen, bu jiayi jiefa. You yidao guangming, he yi bu mingque de jingdian, que yi cong an la jianglin nimen
An la yao jie zhe bu jingdian zhiyin zhuiqiu qi xiyue de ren zou shang ping'an di daolu, yi ziji de yizhi ba tamen cong chongchong hei'an yinru guangming, bing jiang tamen yinru zhenglu

Wangyan an la jiushi mai er yan zhizi mai xi ha de ren, que yi bu xindaole. Ni shuo:“Ruguo an la yu huimie mai xi ha he ta de muqin mai er yan, yiji da dishang de yiqie ren, name, shei neng ganshe an la yi sihao ne?” Tiandi wanwu de zhuquan, zhishi an la de, ta chuangzao tasuo yu chuangzao de.
